title: Trig Identities - Verify âœ“
ques: Verify the identity: **tan x + cot x = sec x csc x**

answer.content:
**Left side (convert to sin/cos):**
$$\tan x + \cot x = \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} + \frac{\cos x}{\sin x}$$
$$= \frac{\sin^2 x + \cos^2 x}{\sin x \cos x}$$
$$= \frac{1}{\sin x \cos x}$$

**Right side:**
$$\sec x \csc x = \frac{1}{\cos x} Ã— \frac{1}{\sin x} = \frac{1}{\sin x \cos x}$$

**LHS = RHS** âœ“
